keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmap d
unmap u
unmap r
unmap t

map <c-d> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-u> scrollFullPageUp

# Change the default mark-keybindings
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map M Marks.activateGotoMode swap

# Go to previously visited tab
map <c-e> visitPreviousTab

# Keybindings for passNextKey
map e passNextKey

exclusionRules.passKeys: a s d f g h j k l w r t
